pkgmetadata.longdescription:
qRestAPI is a free, open-source library for developing RESTful web services with Qt. It is designed to facilitate the development of custom web services for a wide range of applications, including medical imaging, scientific research, and industrial automation.
The library includes a range of features and modules for developing RESTful web services, including support for HTTP request handling, routing, and parameter parsing. It also includes support for a range of data formats, including JSON and XML, as well as authentication and security features.
qRestAPI is built on top of the Qt framework, providing access to a range of advanced features and tools for developing cross-platform applications. It also includes an extensible architecture that allows for the development of custom modules and extensions, making it highly customizable and adaptable to a wide range of use cases.
The library has a user-friendly interface that supports both novice and advanced users, with features such as customizable layouts, interactive documentation, and code generation tools. It also includes a range of advanced features for power users, including scripting, batch processing, and database integration.
Overall, qRestAPI is a powerful and versatile tool for developing RESTful web services with Qt, with a strong user community and ongoing development support.
